humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive tumor, which measures 4.0 cm in largest dimension (part 5, section b). Based on the rules provided, this falls within the criteria for a T2 tumor (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the predicted T stage is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the invasive tumor measures 4.0 cm in largest dimension (part 5, A. Invasive Ductal Carcinoma, Nottingham Grade 2). Therefore, the T stage is T2.
